item.title: Federal judge orders ICE to halt immigration raids in Southern California
item.description: The ACLU's federal lawsuit claims the Trump administration's aggressive immigration enforcement operations violate the Constitution.

item.title: About 200 arrested in immigration raids on Southern California farms, feds say
item.description: Authorities executed criminal search warrants in Carpinteria and Camarillo, California, on Thursday, the Department of Homeland Security said.

item.title: 7/11: CBS Evening News
item.description: Trump surveys deadly storm damage in Texas; Reflecting on the selfless heroism shown during the Texas floods

item.title: 7/11: The Daily Report
item.description: Tom Hanson reports on President Trump's visit to Texas to tour extensive flood damage, and what investigators are revealing about the Air India crash.

item.title: State Department enacts widespread layoffs, cutting 1,353 staff
item.description: The involuntary staff reductions include 1,107 civil service and 246 foreign service employees, according to a notice sent to employees Friday morning...
